item.title: Mufasa: The Lion King Could Be On The Path To Box Office Redemption Following 2 Big Milestones
item.description: Mufasa: The Lion King hits two major milestones over Christmas that indicate its fortunes are reversing after a lukewarm opening weekend.

item.title: Babygirl's Rotten Tomatoes Audience Score Results In A Shocking 2024 Movie Record For Nicole Kidman
item.description: Nicole Kidmanâ€™s Babygirl Rotten Tomatoes score sets a surprising record, with all three 2024 movies receiving mixed ratings from audiences.

item.title: Why Wicked Doesn't Have Any Original Songs For The Movie
item.description: Wicked does not follow the common practice of adding original songs into a movie adaptation of a Broadway musical for an important reason.
